propositions.text: A love story spanning a millennium begins with an ancient encounter.
In an ancient courtyard, a woman in white, stained with blood, expresses deep sorrow and reluctance to part.
The woman disappears in a flash of light, leaving the courtyard empty.
The story transitions to a modern setting with a new protagonist.
The protagonist feels anxious about a new job in a bustling city.
He meets a cheerful girl who helps him adjust to the new environment.
Unexpected events and inner struggles shape the protagonist's journey.
The protagonist experiences a physical collision with a stranger, leading to embarrassment.
He grapples with self-doubt and uncertainty about his path.
A connection to a thousand-year-old legend emerges.
The protagonist learns of Mei Xue, a woman from a tragic love story, whose tale mirrors his dreams.
He questions if there is a real link between him and Mei Xue.
Dreams and reality blur as the past intertwines with the present.
In a dream, the woman in white claims to have waited a thousand years for him.
The protagonist struggles to distinguish between dream and reality.
The protagonist faces a painful choice between past and present.
He debates whether to pursue the elusive past or embrace the current reality.
The story concludes with acceptance and resolution.
The protagonist decides to accept his fate, finding peace by the sea.
He hears a final whisper of love from the past, bringing closure.

concepts.name: Love
concepts.context: Central theme of a千年-spanning emotional bond.

concepts.name: Time
concepts.context: Contrast between ancient past and modern present.

concepts.name: Destiny
concepts.context: The inevitable connection between characters across time.

concepts.name: Struggle
concepts.context: Internal conflict and emotional turmoil of the protagonist.

concepts.name: Dreams
concepts.context: Blurring of reality and visions of the past.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured as a narrative with eight chapters, progressing from an ancient tragic love story to a modern setting, intertwining past and present through dreams and legends, culminating in the protagonist's acceptance of fate.
